page.title: 20KINGSWAY CENTRE CONTINUED
page.content: Since the improvement of the centre swimming has become a lot more popular increasing by over 50% up and the sports centre is a great success. As yet there is still more work to be done They are working on a new energy saving roof for the swimming pool. This will help to save money and heat,for the roof above the the swimming pool now lets out to much heat and uses a lot of money that could be used in a better way. The swimming pool contains 123,354 gallons of water. Around the swimming pool there are seats for 400 spectators The temperature of the water in the pool is 82 degrees F. The water is never changed but runs out of the pool all the time to a filter pump. Where it is cleaned, it then goes to another pipe where it is heated then from there it runs back into the pool.
